explains: n. 羊角面包，新月形面包

sentences.en: Across the busy plaza, vendors sell hot dogs and croissant sandwiches.
sentences.cn: 忙碌的露天广场对面，小贩们在卖热狗和新月形面包三明治。

sentences.en: The flavor of a croissant should be intensely buttery with a natural dairy sweetness.
sentences.cn: 牛角面包的味道应该是浓郁的黄油味，并带有天然奶制品的甜味。

sentences.en: I almost choked on my croissant.
sentences.cn: 我差点被羊角面包噎住了。
